The source of the claim: The expert's verdict mentions that the claim was made on a Facebook page called Voice of Muslims. This indicates that the claim originated from a specific source.
Social media sharing: The claim and accompanying photograph were shared over 11,000 times on social media. This suggests that the claim gained significant attention and spread widely among users.
Verification request: Users of the official Alt News app requested verification of the image and claim. This shows that there was a need for fact-checking and verification of the authenticity of the claim.
Reverse image search: Alt News conducted a reverse image search using Yandex and found several results indicating that the image was from Chittagong, Bangladesh. This method of verification helped to establish the true origin of the image and debunk the false narrative surrounding it.
